Text:
Hey thanks for all your great uploads
Is there anyway you can upload this BRrip with the subs hard coded please? Or if you know of a program that can hard code subs that would work too Iv'e been looking for a program that adds subs hard coded without having to convert and lose quality any help would be greatly appreciated thanks
Chinese. Dubbed in Cantonese most probably.
The english subs are messed up and does not work, at least not in VLC. Open the srt file in an editor and remove the first five entries. Then it works.
